com.itko.lisa.remote.client

Class AgentClassLoader

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.ClassLoader
      • java.security.SecureClassLoader
        • java.net.URLClassLoader
          • com.itko.lisa.remote.client.AgentClassLoader
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Closeable, java.lang.AutoCloseable

    public class AgentClassLoader
extends java.net.URLClassLoader
    A nifty little classloader that is connected to an agent and downloads class jars or files from it as needed
